text: Armando Valles (born 6 May 1941) is a Mexican gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Mexico Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City Category:Pan American Games medalists in gymnastics Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Mexico Category:Gymnasts at the 1967 Pan American Games
title: Armando Valles
